channel.title: Cody Zanga's Sports Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Cody Zanga's Sports Blog

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Cody Zanga and I’m currently a senior at the University of Nebraska-Lincoln. I’ll be graduating this fall with a major in sports media and communication with a minor in statistics. I’m originally from Renton, Wash. and grew up a fan of all the Seattle sports teams. I’ve been fascinated with looking at statistics in sports ever since I was a kid. I plan on analyzing data on all sorts of different sports and teams, but especially my Seattle Mariners.

item.title: Were the 2021 Mariners lucky, good or both?
item.description: Fans of the Seattle Mariners have had to face more consistent ineptitude than almost any other professional team in American sports. For a team that has been around since 1977 to only have four playoff appearances is unacceptable. Currently, the last playoff appearance for the Mariner’s was in 2001, which was 21-years-ago. With that said, the Mariner’s are the proud owners of the longest playoff drought in American sports, but last season there was a glimmer of hope.
